typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		UnitedKingdomProviderReferenceNumber as string,
		ProviderName as string,
		TradingName as string,
		ProviderStatus as string,
		ProviderType as integer,
		ProviderContact as (ContactType as string, ContactAddress as (SAON as (Description as string), PAON as (Description as string), StreetDescription as string, UniqueStreetReferenceNumber as string, Locality as string, Items as string[], ItemsElementName as string[], PostTown as string, PostCode as string, UniquePropertyReferenceNumber as string), ContactPersonalDetails as (PersonNameTitle as string, PersonGivenName as string, PersonFamilyName as string, PersonNameSuffix as string, PersonRequestedName as string), ContactRole as string, ContactTelephone1 as string, ContactTelephone2 as string, ContactFax as string, ContactWebsiteAddress as string, ContactEmail as string, LastUpdated as string)[],
		ProviderVerificationDate as string,
		ProviderVerificationDateSpecified as boolean,
		ExpiryDateSpecified as boolean,
		ProviderAssociations as string,
		ProviderAliases as (ProviderAlias as string, LastUpdated as string)[],
		VerificationDetails as (VerificationAuthority as string, VerificationID as string)[],
		id as string,
		DateUpdated as string,
		DateDownloaded as string,
		Status as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> Providers
source(output(
		id as string,
		CourseId as string,
		QualificationCourseTitle as string,
		LearnAimRef as string,
		NotionalNVQLevelv2 as string,
		AwardOrgCode as string,
		QualificationType as string,
		ProviderUKPRN as string,
		CourseDescription as string,
		EntryRequirements as string,
		WhatYoullLearn as string,
		HowYoullLearn as string,
		WhatYoullNeed as string,
		HowYoullBeAssessed as string,
		WhereNext as string,
		AdultEducationBudget as boolean,
		AdvancedLearnerLoan as boolean,
		CourseRuns as (id as string, CourseInstanceId as string, VenueId as string, CourseName as string, ProviderCourseID as string, DeliveryMode as string, FlexibleStartDate as boolean, StartDate as string, CourseURL as string, Cost as string, CostDescription as string, DurationUnit as string, DurationValue as string, StudyMode as string, AttendancePattern as string, National as boolean, Regions as string[], RecordStatus as string, CreatedDate as string, CreatedBy as string, UpdatedDate as string, UpdatedBy as string, SubRegions as string, BulkUploadErrors as string)[],
		CourseStatus as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		CreatedBy as string,
		UpdatedDate as string,
		IsValid as boolean,
		UpdatedBy as string,
		BulkUploadErrors as string[],
		LarlessReason as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Courses
Providers filter((ProviderType == 1 || ProviderType == 3)
    && (Status == 1 || ProviderStatus == "Active")) ~> FilterActive
FilterPrimaryContact derive(ContactAddress1 = concatWS(
    ", ",
    iif(!isNull(ProviderContact.ContactAddress.SAON.Description) && ProviderContact.ContactAddress.SAON.Description != "null", 
        ProviderContact.ContactAddress.SAON.Description
    ), 
    iif(!isNull(ProviderContact.ContactAddress.PAON.Description) && ProviderContact.ContactAddress.PAON.Description != "null", 
        ProviderContact.ContactAddress.PAON.Description
    ),
    iif(!isNull(ProviderContact.ContactAddress.StreetDescription) && ProviderContact.ContactAddress.StreetDescription != "null", 
        ProviderContact.ContactAddress.StreetDescription
    )
),
		ContactAddress2 = ProviderContact.ContactAddress.Locality,
		ContactTown = iifNull(ProviderContact.ContactAddress.PostTown, ProviderContact.ContactAddress.Items[1]),
		ContactPostcode = ProviderContact.ContactAddress.PostCode,
		ContactPhone = iifNull(ProviderContact.ContactTelephone1, ProviderContact.ContactTelephone2)) ~> CreateContactAddress
CreateContactAddress select(mapColumn(
		ProviderUkprn = UnitedKingdomProviderReferenceNumber,
		ProviderName,
		TradingName,
		ProviderStatus,
		ProviderType,
		ContactType = ProviderContact.ContactType,
		ContactAddress1,
		ContactAddress2,
		ContactTown,
		ContactPostcode,
		ContactPhone,
		ContactEmail = ProviderContact.ContactEmail,
		ContactWebsite = ProviderContact.ContactWebsiteAddress
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Transform
Transform sort(asc(ProviderUkprn, false),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortedProviders
Courses foldDown(unroll(CourseRuns),
	mapColumn(
		ProviderUKPRN,
		RecordStatus = CourseRuns.RecordStatus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCourseRuns
FilterActive, FlattenCourseRuns exists(UnitedKingdomProviderReferenceNumber == ProviderUKPRN,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> HasLiveCourses
HasLiveCourses derive(ProviderContact = iifNull(
    filter(ProviderContact, #item.ContactType == "P")[1], 
    filter(ProviderContact, #item.ContactType == "L")[1]
)) ~> FilterPrimaryContact
SortedProviders sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['providers.json'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Cache
